As an AI language model, I don't have access to real-time updates on current news or events. However, it's not uncommon for companies to face ethical sourcing issues at some point in their history due to various reasons such as a lack of transparency, insufficient supplier monitoring, or changing regulations.

That being said, I cannot confirm whether Aviva has faced ethical sourcing issues in the past, but it's worth noting that the company's commitment to responsible investing and sustainability suggests a proactive approach to mitigate the risk of or quickly address any such issues to achieve its ethical sourcing goals.
